title: Remote-Talks
shortDesc: RemoteTalks is a web-based communication platform inspired by Zoom, developed using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js). The platform aims to provide a comprehensive remote communication experience, allowing users to create and join meetings, share their screens, send chat messages, manage friend requests, and edit their profiles.
features: Meeting Features: Remote Talk Allows Users To Create Meetings With Features Such As Virtual Hand-Raising, Screen Sharing, And Live Streaming
Chat System: Remote Talk Has A Built-In Messenger System For Communication Outside Of Meetings
Profile Editing: Remote Talk Users Can Edit Their Profiles And Send Friend Requests
Feedback System: Remote Talk Has An Option For Users To Provide Feedback On The Application
Authentication And Authorization: Remote Talk Has A Secure User Authentication System With JWT Tokens.
Responsive Design: Remote Talk Is Designed With A Responsive Interface For Optimal User Experience On Different Devices.
technology: Backend:  Node, Express,   VideoSDK, webRTC, webSocket
Other tools and libraries: Netlify, ReactHookFrom, TanStack-React-Query
